tool_description: An API showing latest Climate Change News around the world
name: Climate Change News_v5
title: Climate Change News

api_list.name: Get News From Single News Resource
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get news from one specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news132.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news132.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news132.p.rapidapi.com/news/{is_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news132.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
